name: üèÜ Overall Score
query: SELECT participants.participant AS id, res.detail.overall_total_score AS Score FROM results CROSS JOIN UNNEST(results.results) AS t(res) ORDER BY Score DESC

name: üèÜ Overall Win Rate
query: SELECT participants.participant AS id, ROUND(res.detail.overall_win_rate * 100, 1) || '%' AS Win_Rate FROM results CROSS JOIN UNNEST(results.results) AS t(res) ORDER BY res.detail.overall_win_rate DESC

name: üê∫ Werewolf Score
query: SELECT participants.participant AS id, COALESCE(res.detail.by_role.WEREWOLF.total_score, 0) AS Score FROM results CROSS JOIN UNNEST(results.results) AS t(res) ORDER BY Score DESC

name: ü©∏ Werewolf Kill Count
query: SELECT participants.participant AS id, SUM(g.werewolf_kills) AS Total_Kills FROM results CROSS JOIN UNNEST(results.results) AS t(res) CROSS JOIN UNNEST(res.detail.by_role.WEREWOLF.games) AS t2(g) GROUP BY id ORDER BY Total_Kills DESC

name: üßô Seer Score
query: SELECT participants.participant AS id, COALESCE(res.detail.by_role.SEER.total_score, 0) AS Score FROM results CROSS JOIN UNNEST(results.results) AS t(res) ORDER BY Score DESC

name: üïµÔ∏è Seer Wolves Found
query: SELECT participants.participant AS id, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE g.seer_found_werewolf = true) AS Wolves_Found FROM results CROSS JOIN UNNEST(results.results) AS t(res) CROSS JOIN UNNEST(res.detail.by_role.SEER.games) AS t2(g) GROUP BY id ORDER BY Wolves_Found DESC

name: ü©∫ Doctor Score
query: SELECT participants.participant AS id, COALESCE(res.detail.by_role.DOCTOR.total_score, 0) AS Score FROM results CROSS JOIN UNNEST(results.results) AS t(res) ORDER BY Score DESC

name: üè• Doctor Lives Saved
query: SELECT participants.participant AS id, SUM(g.doctor_successful_saves) AS Lives_Saved FROM results CROSS JOIN UNNEST(results.results) AS t(res) CROSS JOIN UNNEST(res.detail.by_role.DOCTOR.games) AS t2(g) GROUP BY id ORDER BY Lives_Saved DESC

name: üåæ Villager Score
query: SELECT participants.participant AS id, COALESCE(res.detail.by_role.VILLAGER.total_score, 0) AS Score FROM results CROSS JOIN UNNEST(results.results) AS t(res) ORDER BY Score DESC

name: ‚è≥ Villager Survival Time
query: SELECT participants.participant AS id, ROUND(AVG(g.rounds_played), 2) AS Avg_Rounds FROM results CROSS JOIN UNNEST(results.results) AS t(res) CROSS JOIN UNNEST(res.detail.by_role.VILLAGER.games) AS t2(g) GROUP BY id ORDER BY Avg_Rounds DESC
